Entry.JapaneseText: 結局、聖獣を探す手がかりは何もなかったネ……
Entry.EnglishText: Well in the end, I guess there wasn't anything here that would lead us to the Sacred Beast...

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとう……大丈夫…… 聖獣の事だって……きっと……
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you... I'm all right... I'm sure... that all this had something to do with that Sacred Beast...

Entry.JapaneseText: 「自分が何者かを知れ」……私…… 少しだけ、その意味がわかった気がするから……
Entry.EnglishText: "Become aware of what you are..." I... feel as though I've come to understand that somewhat...

Entry.JapaneseText: よし……じゃあ、聖獣探しの続きだな。
Entry.EnglishText: All right... Well, let's continue our search.
